latestVersion.termsOfAccess:
Project files like raw data, coding guidelines and questionnaires can now be directly downloaded from this site.
Please see also SSD's Farm Household Survey Database (http://ricestat.irri.org/fhsd/).
latestVersion.dataAccessPlace: All files for this project/study, except for the Project Description, need to be directly downloaded from SSD's Farm Household Survey Database's online link: http://ricestat.irri.org/fhsd/

fields.value: Baby Trial Monitoring Survey of Participatory Varietal Selection under STRASA

dsDescriptionValue.value: To evaluate the performance of stress-tolerant varieties in farmer's field and compared it with the common varieties (local check).

keywordValue.value: type of stress, submergence condition, salinity condition, performance comparison, seed distribution, technology tracking

fields.value: Subject: Number of Repondents  Type: Sample Size  Notes: 646;

value: India (25 districts), Bangladesh (8 districts) and Nepal (6 districts)
